member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57
member.summary: E57 (ASTM E2807-11) Standard Specification for 3D Imaging Data Exchange, Version 1.0. https://www.astm.org/Standards/E2807.htm

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PhysicalOffset
member.summary: Physical E57 file offset.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57LogicalOffset
member.summary: Logical E57 file offset.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57FileHeader
member.summary: E57 File Header (7. File Header Section). TABLE 1 Format of the E57 File Header Section.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Integer
member.summary: TABLE 2 Attributes for an Integer Type E57 Element.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Integer.Minimum
member.summary: Optional. Default –2^63. The smallest value that can be encoded. Shall be in the interval [-2^63, 2^63-1].

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Integer.Maximum
member.summary: Optional. Default 2^63-1. The largest value that can be encoded. Shall be in the interval [minimum, 2^63-1].

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57ScaledInteger
member.summary: TABLE 3 Attributes for a ScaledInteger Type E57 Element.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57ScaledInteger.Minimum
member.summary: Optional. Default –2^63. The smallest rawValue that can be encoded. Shall be in the interval [-2^63, 2^63-1].

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57ScaledInteger.Maximum
member.summary: Optional. Default 2^63-1. The largest rawValue that can be encoded. Shall be in the interval [minimum, 2^63-1].

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57ScaledInteger.Scale
member.summary: Optional. Default 1.0. The scale value for the ScaledInteger. Shall be non-zero.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57ScaledInteger.Offset
member.summary: Optional. Default 0.0. The offset value for the ScaledInteger.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57ScaledInteger.RawValue
member.summary: Stored integer value.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57ScaledInteger.Value
member.summary: Value = RawValue * Scale + Offset.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Float
member.summary: TABLE 4 Attributes for a Float Type E57 Element.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Float.IsDoublePrecision
member.summary: True for 64 bit floating point values (IEEE 754-1985), false for 32 bit (IEEE 754-1985).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Float.Minimum
member.summary: Optional. Default double.MinValue. The smallest value that can be encoded.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Float.Maximum
member.summary: Optional. Default double.MaxValue. The largest value that can be encoded.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57String
member.summary: TABLE 4 Attributes for a Float Type E57 Element.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Blob
member.summary: TABLE 6 Attributes of a Blob Type E57 Element.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Blob.FileOffset
member.summary: Required. The physical file offset of the start of the associated binary Blob section in the E57 file. Shall be in the interval [0, 2^63).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Blob.Length
member.summary: Required. The logical length of the associated binary Blob section, in bytes. Shall be in the interval (0, 2^63).

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Structure
member.summary: TABLE 7 Attributes for a Structure Type E57 Element.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Vector
member.summary: TABLE 8 Attributes for a Vector Type E57 Element.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Vector.AllowHeterogenousChildren
member.summary: Optional. Indicates whether the child elements may have different structure. Set to 1 to enable, set to 0 to disable.Shall be either 0 or 1.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Vector.Children
member.summary: Vector elements.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CompressedVector
member.summary: TABLE 9 Attributes for a CompressedVector Type E57 Element. TABLE 10 Child Elements for a CompressedVector Type E57 Element.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CompressedVector.FileOffset
member.summary: Required. The physical file offset of the start of the CompressedVector binary section in the E57 file(an integer). Shall be in the interval(0, 2^63).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CompressedVector.RecordCount
member.summary: Required. The number of records in the compressed binary block (an integer). Shall be in the interval[0, 2^63).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CompressedVector.Prototype
member.summary: Required. Structure, Integer, Float, ScaledInteger, String, or Vector. Specifies the fields of the CompressedVector records and their range limits.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CompressedVector.Codecs
member.summary: Optional. Vector of Codec Structures. A heterogeneous Vector specifying the compression method to be used for fields within the CompressedVector.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Codec
member.summary: TABLE 11 Child Elements for the Codec Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Codec.Inputs
member.summary: Required. A Vector listing the relative path names of elements in the prototype that this codec will compress.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Codec.BitPackCodec
member.summary: Optional. Specifies that the bitPackCodec will be used for compressing the data.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Root
member.summary: E57 Root (8.4 XML Data Hierarchy). TABLE 12 Child Elements for the E57Root Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Root.XmlRoot
member.summary: Raw XML.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Root.FormatName
member.summary: Required. Shall contain the string “ASTM E57 3D Imaging Data File”.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Root.Guid
member.summary: Required. A globally unique identification (GUID) String for the current version of the file (see 8.4.22).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Root.VersionMajor
member.summary: Required. The major version number of the file format. Shall be 1.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Root.VersionMinor
member.summary: Required. The minor version number of the file format. Shall be 0.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Root.E57LibraryVersion
member.summary: Optional. The version identifier for the E57 file format library that wrote the file.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Root.CreationDateTime
member.summary: Optional. Date and time that the file was created.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Root.Data3D
member.summary: Optional. A heterogeneous Vector of Data3D Structures for storing 3D imaging data.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Root.Images2D
member.summary: Optional. A heterogeneous Vector of Image2D Structures for storing 2D images from a camera or similar device.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Root.CoordinateMetadata
member.summary: Optional. Information describing the Coordinate Reference System to be used for the file.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D
member.summary: E57 Data3D (8.4.3. Data3D). TABLE 13 Child Elements for the Data3D Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.Guid
member.summary: Required. A globally unique identifier for the current version of the Data3D object (see 8.4.22).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.Points
member.summary: Required. A compressed vector of PointRecord Structures referring to the binary data that actually stores the point data.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.Pose
member.summary: Optional. A rigid body transform that transforms data stored in the local coordinate system of the points to the file-level coordinate system.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.OriginalGuids
member.summary: Optional. A Vector of globally unique identifiers identifying the data set(or sets) from which the points in this Data3D originated.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.PointGroupingSchemes
member.summary: Optional. The defined schemes that group points in different ways.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.Name
member.summary: Optional. A user-defined name for the Data3D.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.Description
member.summary: Optional. A user-defined description of the Data3D.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.CartesianBounds
member.summary: Optional. The bounding region (in Cartesian coordinates) of all the points in this Data3D(in the local coordinate system of the points).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.SphericalBounds
member.summary: Optional. The bounding region (in spherical coordinates) of all the points in this Data3D(in the local coordinate system of the points).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.IndexBounds
member.summary: Optional. The bounds of the row, column, and return number of all the points in this Data3D.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.IntensityLimits
member.summary: Optional. The limits for the value of signal intensity that the sensor is capable of producing.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.ColorLimits
member.summary: Optional. The limits for the value of red, green, and blue color that the sensor is capable of producing.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.AcquisitonStart
member.summary: Optional. The start date and time that the data was acquired.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.AcquisitonEnd
member.summary: Optional. The end date and time that the data was acquired.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.SensorVendor
member.summary: Optional. The name of the manufacturer for the sensor used to collect the points in this Data3D.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.SensorModel
member.summary: Optional. The model name or number for the sensor.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.SensorSerialNumber
member.summary: Optional. The serial number for the sensor.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.SensorHardwareVersion
member.summary: Optional. The version identifier for the sensor hardware at the time of data collection.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.SensorSoftwareVersion
member.summary: Optional. The version identifier for the software used for the data collection.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.SensorFirmwareVersion
member.summary: Optional. The version identifier for the firmware installed in the sensor at the time of data collection.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.Temperature
member.summary: Optional. The ambient temperature, measured at the sensor, at the time of data collection (in degrees Celsius). Shall be greater or equal to −273.15° (absolute zero).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.RelativeHumidity
member.summary: Optional. The percentage relative humidity, measured at the sensor, at the time of data collection. Shall be in the interval [0,100].

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Data3D.AtmosphericPressure
member.summary: Optional. The atmospheric pressure, measured at the sensor, at the time of data collection (in Pascals). Shall be positive.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PointRecord
member.summary: TABLE 14 Child Elements for the PointRecord Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PointRecord.GroupingByLine
member.summary: Optional. Grouping information by row or column index.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PointGroupingSchemes
member.summary: TABLE 15 Child Elements for the PointGroupingSchemes Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PointGroupingSchemes.GroupingByLine
member.summary: Optional. Grouping information by row or column index.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.GroupingByLine
member.summary: TABLE 16 Child Elements for the GroupingByLine Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.GroupingByLine.IdElementName
member.summary: Required. The name of the PointRecord element that identifies which group the point is in. The value of this string shall be “rowIndex” or “columnIndex” (see 8.4.4.2).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.GroupingByLine.Groups
member.summary: Required. A compressedVector of LineGroupRecord Structures.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57LineGroupRecord
member.summary: TABLE 17 Child Elements for the LineGroupRecord Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57LineGroupRecord.IdElementValue
member.summary: Required. The value of the identifying element of all members in this group. Shall be in the interval[0, 2^63).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57LineGroupRecord.StartPointIndex
member.summary: Optional. The record number of the first point in the continuous interval. Shall be in the interval[0, 2^63).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57LineGroupRecord.PointCount
member.summary: Optional. The number of PointRecords in the group. Shall be in the interval [1, 2^63).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57LineGroupRecord.CartesianBounds
member.summary: Optional. The bounding box (in Cartesian coordinates) of all points in the group (in the local coordinate system of the points).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57LineGroupRecord.SphericalBounds
member.summary: Optional. The bounding region (in spherical coordinates) of all the points in the group (in the local coordinate system of the points).

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57RigidBodyTransform
member.summary: TABLE 18 Child Elements for the RigidBodyTransform Structure.

member.name: P:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57RigidBodyTransform.Rotation
member.summary: Required. A unit quaternion representing the rotation, R, of the transform.

member.name: P:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57RigidBodyTransform.Translation
member.summary: Required. The translation, t, of the transform.

member.name: P:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57RigidBodyTransform.RigidBodyTransform
member.summary: A 3D point is transformed from the source coordinate system to the destination coordinate system by first applying the rotation and then the translation: p' = Rp + t

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Image2D
member.summary: E57 Image2D (8.4.11. Image2D) TABLE 21 Child Elements for the Image2D Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Image2D.Guid
member.summary: Required. A globally unique identifier for the current version of the Image2D object (see 8.4.22).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Image2D.VisualReferenceRepresentation
member.summary: Optional. Representation for an image that does not define any camera projection model.The image is to be used for visual reference only.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Image2D.PinholeRepresentation
member.summary: Optional. Representation for an image using the pinhole camera projection model.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Image2D.SphericalRepresentation
member.summary: Optional. Representation for an image using the spherical camera projection model.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Image2D.CylindricalRepresentation
member.summary: Optional. Representation for an image using the cylindrical camera projection model.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Image2D.Pose
member.summary: Optional. A rigid body transform that transforms data stored in the local coordinate system of the image to the file-level coordinate system.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Image2D.AssociatedData3DGuid
member.summary: Optional. The globally unique identifier for the Data3D object that was being acquired when the picture was taken(see8.4.22).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Image2D.Name
member.summary: Optional. A user-defined name for the Image2D.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Image2D.Description
member.summary: Optional. A user-defined description of the Image2D.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Image2D.AcquisitionDateTime
member.summary: Optional. The date and time that the image was acquired.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Image2D.SensorVendor
member.summary: Optional. The name of the manufacturer for the sensor used to collect the image in this Image2D.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Image2D.SensorModel
member.summary: Optional. The model name or number for the sensor.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57Image2D.SensorSerialNumber
member.summary: Optional. The serial number for the sensor.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57VisualReferenceRepresentation
member.summary: TABLE 22 Child Elements for the VisualReferenceRepresentation Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57VisualReferenceRepresentation.JpegImage
member.summary: Optional. JPEG format image data.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57VisualReferenceRepresentation.PngImage
member.summary: Optional. PNG format image data.

member.name: P:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57VisualReferenceRepresentation.ImageMask
member.summary: Optional. PNG format image mask.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57VisualReferenceRepresentation.ImageWidth
member.summary: Required. The image width (in pixels). Shall be positive.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57VisualReferenceRepresentation.ImageHeight
member.summary: Required. The image height (in pixels). Shall be positive.

member.name: P:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57VisualReferenceRepresentation.ImageSize
member.summary: (ImageWidth, ImageHeight).

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PinholeRepresentation
member.summary: TABLE 23 Child Elements for the PinholeRepresentation Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PinholeRepresentation.JpegImage
member.summary: Optional. JPEG format image data.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PinholeRepresentation.PngImage
member.summary: Optional. PNG format image data.

member.name: P:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PinholeRepresentation.ImageMask
member.summary: Optional. PNG format image mask.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PinholeRepresentation.ImageWidth
member.summary: Required. The image width (in pixels). Shall be positive.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PinholeRepresentation.ImageHeight
member.summary: Required. The image height (in pixels). Shall be positive.

member.name: P:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PinholeRepresentation.ImageSize
member.summary: (ImageWidth, ImageHeight).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PinholeRepresentation.FocalLength
member.summary: Required. The camera’s focal length (in meters). Shall be positive.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PinholeRepresentation.PixelWidth
member.summary: Required. The width of the pixels in the camera (in meters). Shall be positive.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PinholeRepresentation.PixelHeight
member.summary: Required. The height of the pixels in the camera (in meters). Shall be positive.

member.name: P:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PinholeRepresentation.PixelSize
member.summary: (PixelWidth, PixelHeight).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PinholeRepresentation.PrincipalPointX
member.summary: Required. The X coordinate in the image of the principal point, (in pixels). The principal point is the intersection of the z axis of the camera coordinate frame with the image plane.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PinholeRepresentation.PrincipalPointY
member.summary: Required. The Y coordinate in the image of the principal point(in pixels).

member.name: P:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57PinholeRepresentation.PrincipalPoint
member.summary: (PrincipalPointX, PrincipalPointY).

member.summary: Optional. PNG format image data.

member.name: P:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57SphericalRepresentation.ImageMask
member.summary: Optional. PNG format image mask.

member.name: P:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57SphericalRepresentation.ImageSize

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57SphericalRepresentation.PixelHeight

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CylindricalRepresentation
member.summary: TABLE 25 Child Elements for the CylindricalRepresentation Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CylindricalRepresentation.JpegImage
member.summary: Optional. JPEG format image data.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CylindricalRepresentation.PngImage
member.summary: Optional. PNG format image data.

member.name: P:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CylindricalRepresentation.ImageMask
member.summary: Optional. PNG format image mask.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CylindricalRepresentation.ImageWidth
member.summary: Required. The image width (in pixels). Shall be positive.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CylindricalRepresentation.ImageHeight
member.summary: Required. The image height (in pixels). Shall be positive.

member.name: P:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CylindricalRepresentation.ImageSize
member.summary: (ImageWidth, ImageHeight).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CylindricalRepresentation.Radius
member.summary: Required. The closest distance from the cylindrical image surface to the center of projection(that is, the radius of the cylinder) (in meters). Shall be non-negative.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CylindricalRepresentation.PrincipalPointY
member.summary: Required. TheYcoordinate in the image of the principal point (in pixels). This is the intersection of the z=0 plane with the image.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CylindricalRepresentation.PixelWidth
member.summary: Required. The width of the pixels in the camera (in meters). Shall be positive.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CylindricalRepresentation.PixelHeight
member.summary: Required. The height of the pixels in the camera (in meters). Shall be positive.

member.name: P:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CylindricalRepresentation.PixelSize
member.summary: (PixelWidth, PixelHeight).

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CartesianBounds
member.summary: TABLE 26 Child Elements for the CartesianBounds Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CartesianBounds.Bounds
member.summary: Required. The extent of the bounding region (in meters).

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57SphericalBounds
member.summary: TABLE 27 Child Elements for the SphericalBounds Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57SphericalBounds.Range
member.summary: Required. The extent of the bounding region in the r direction (in meters). Shall be non-negative.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57SphericalBounds.Elevation
member.summary: Required. The extent of the bounding region in the φ direction (in radians). Shall be in the interval[-π/2, π/2].

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57SphericalBounds.Azimuth
member.summary: Required. The azimuth angle defining the extent of the bounding region in the θ direction (in radians). Shall be in the interval(-π, π].

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IndexBounds
member.summary: TABLE 28 Child Elements for the IndexBounds Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IndexBounds.Row
member.summary: Required. The rowIndex range of any point represented by this IndexBounds object.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IndexBounds.Column
member.summary: Required. The columnIndex range of any point represented by this IndexBounds object.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IndexBounds.Return
member.summary: Required. The returnIndex range of any point represented by this IndexBounds object.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IntensityLimits
member.summary: TABLE 29 Child Elements for IntensityLimits Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IntensityLimits.Intensity
member.summary: Required. The producible intensity range. Unit is unspecified.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57ColorLimits
member.summary: TABLE 30 Child Elements for the ColorLimits Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57ColorLimits.Red
member.summary: Required. The producible red color range. Unit is unspecified.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57ColorLimits.Green
member.summary: Required. The producible green color range. Unit is unspecified.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57ColorLimits.Blue
member.summary: Required. The producible blue color range. Unit is unspecified.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57DateTime
member.summary: TABLE 31 Child Elements for DateTime Structure.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57DateTime.DateTimeValue
member.summary: Required. The time, in seconds, since GPS start epoch. This time specification may include fractions of a second. The GPS start epoch occured at 0 h UTC (12:00 midnight) on January 6, 1980.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57DateTime.IsAtomicClockReferenced
member.summary: Required. This element shall be present, and its value set to 1 if, and only if, the time stored in the dateTimeValue element is obtained from an atomic clock time source. Shall be either 0 or 1.

member.name: P:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57DateTime.DateTime
member.summary: The time.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CompressedVectorHeader
member.summary: E57 CompressedVector Header (9.3. CompressedVector Binary Section). TABLE 35 Fields for the CompressedVector Header.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CompressedVectorHeader.SectionId
member.summary: E57_COMPRESSED_VECTOR_SECTION (value = 1).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CompressedVectorHeader.Reserved
member.summary: Reserved bytes for future versions of the standard. Shall all be 0.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CompressedVectorHeader.SectionLength
member.summary: The logical length of the CompressedVector binary section (in bytes).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CompressedVectorHeader.DataStartOffset
member.summary: The file offset of the first data packet in this binary section (in bytes).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57CompressedVectorHeader.IndexStartOffset
member.summary: The file offset to the root level index packet in this binary section (in bytes).

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IndexPacketHeader
member.summary: E57 Index Packet Header (9.4. Index Packe). TABLE 36 Format of an Index Packet Header.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IndexPacketHeader.PacketType
member.summary: E57_INDEX_PACKET (value = 0).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IndexPacketHeader.Reserved1
member.summary: Reserved for future versions of the standard. Shall all be 0.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IndexPacketHeader.PacketLengthMinus1
member.summary: One less than the logical length of the packet (in bytes). Shall be in the interval (0, 2^16).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IndexPacketHeader.EntryCount
member.summary: The number ofu sed address entries in this packet. Shall be in the interval [1, 2048].

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IndexPacketHeader.IndexLevel
member.summary: The level of this index packet in the tree if index packets. The bottom (leaf) level is zero. Shall be in the interval [0, 5].

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IndexPacketHeader.Reserved2
member.summary: Reserved bytes for future versions of the standard. Shall all be zero.

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IndexPacketAddressEntry
member.summary: E57 Index Packet Address Entry (9.4. Index Packet). TABLE 37 Format of Index Packet Address Entries.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IndexPacketAddressEntry.ChunkRecordIndex
member.summary: The index of the first record stored in this chunk (for leaf nodes), or the index of the first record stored in any chunks within the sub-tree(for non-leaf nodes). Shall be in the interval[0, 2^63).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57IndexPacketAddressEntry.PacketOffset
member.summary: The file offset to a data packet (for leaf nodes) or to a lower level index packet(for non-leaf nodes). Shall be in the interval(0, 2^63).

member.name: T:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57DataPacketHeader
member.summary: E57 Data Packet Header (9.5. Data Packet). TABLE 38 Format of a Data Packet Header.

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57DataPacketHeader.PacketType
member.summary: E57_DATA_PACKET (value = 1).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57DataPacketHeader.PacketFlags
member.summary: Packet flag field (described in 9.5.7).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57DataPacketHeader.PacketLengthMinus1
member.summary: One less than the logical length of the packet (in bytes). To maintain alignment, the packet may be padded with up to three zero-valued bytes after the last used field. The length includes any zero padding that is present. Shall be in the interval (0,2^16).

member.name: F:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.E57DataPacketHeader.ByteStreamCount
member.summary: The number of bytestreams in this packet. Shall be in the interval [0, 32763].

member.name: M:Aardvark.Data.E57.ASTM_E57.VerifyChecksums(System.IO.Stream,System.Int64)
member.summary: Verifies file checksums (CRC).

member.summary: Read given number of logical unsigned shorts (excluding 32-bit CRC at the end of each 1024 byte page) from stream, starting at raw stream position 'startPhysical'.

member.name: M:Aardvark.Base.BitPack.BitCountInBytes(System.Int32)
member.summary: Computes number of bytes required to store n bits. Last byte may not be fully used (if n is not a multiple of 8).
